VB
with
OBJ
and
PREP
‘to’
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ

sense.def:
To offer something to someone
pomeni vprašati nekoga, ali bi želel nekaj imeti ali uporabljati.

seg.quote: ...an apple which he offered to his friend.
I was offered a place at Harvard University.
I'll offer you nine pounds for it.

sense.def:
To offer to do something
pomeni reči, da smo pripravljeni nekaj narediti.

seg.quote: Gopal offered to take us to Mysore.
‘We could take it for you,’ offered Dolly.

sense.def:
To make an offer
pomeni izreči besede, s katerimi nekomu nekaj ponudimo.

seg.quote: She accepted the offer of a cigarette.
...Kirk's offer to take me to the clinic.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To offer someone information, advice, or praise
pomeni nekomu povedati podatke, dati nasvet ali pohvalo.

seg.quote: They didn't ask Liebermann's name and Liebermann didn't offer it.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
offers a service, opportunity, or product
, zagotavlja neko dejavnost, priložnost ali izdelek.

seg.quote: The new car plant offers the prospect of 5,000 jobs.
...the facilities and equipment offered by the playgroup.

sense.def:
V trgovini je
an offer
posebno nizka cena kakega izdelka ali nekaj dodatnega, kar dobimo, če kupimo določen izdelek.

Kar je
on offer
, je mogoče uporabljati ali kupiti.

seg.quote: ...the weird and wonderful range of gear on offer.
